title: The Reason I’m Being Watched?
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>I kind of feel like I’m being watched....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Whenever I’m doing student council work, someone from the club always comes to peek at me.... Are they worried that I may not be balancing both the student council and the club properly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. They are worried, but it’s probably not what you think, Shioriko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kanan-san and Mari-san often come to see me too, but they seem to be worried about whether I’m overworking myself or not.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No way....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It should be the same in your case, Shioriko-san. Everyone at Nijigaku is like that, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Y-, yes! They’re all very kind people. I’ll do better to not make them worry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Do indulge them once in a while. They all want to support you, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
